General.Name: Vietnam Manufacturing and Export Processing (Holdings) Limited
General.Description: Vietnam Manufacturing and Export Processing (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells motorbikes, and related spare parts and engines in Vietnam. The company also engages in the provision of motorbike maintenance and mold services. It offers motorbikes under the SYM brand. The company also manufactures molds for making die-cast and forged metal parts. As of December 31, 2022, it had operated a distribution network of approximately 163 SYM authorized stores owned by dealers in Vietnam. In addition, the company develops real estate properties. It also exports its products to Malaysia, the Philippines, Thailand, Greece, and Taiwan. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Biên Hòa, Vietnam. Vietnam Manufacturing and Export Processing (Holdings) Limited is a subsidiary of SY International Ltd.
General.Address: Tam Hiep Ward, Biên Hòa, Vietnam
